jsymbolic2.processing

Class UserFeedbackGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsymbolic2.processing.UserFeedbackGenerator

  • public class UserFeedbackGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A holder class for static methods for printing various kinds of formatted messages during processing to specified PrintStreams, primarily related to jSymbolic status updates and to errors.
    Author:
    Cory McKay

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserFeedbackGenerator()

                                              java.lang.Exception exception)

        Parameters:

      • indicateIncorrectCommandLineArgumentsAndEndExecution

        public static void indicateIncorrectCommandLineArgumentsAndEndExecution(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                                                        java.lang.String[] args)
        Print a formatted message to stream indicating that erroneous command line parameters were entered, and providing correct usage instructions. Terminate all processing once this is done.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        args - Arguments with which jSymbolic was run at the command line.

      • printParsingConfigFileMessage

        public static void printParsingConfigFileMessage(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                                 java.lang.String config_file_path)
        Print a formatted message to stream indicating that a configurations settings file is being loaded, and specify what the file's path is.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        config_file_path - The path of the file being loaded.

      • printFeatureExtractionStartingMessage

        public static void printFeatureExtractionStartingMessage(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                                         int total)
        Print a formatted message to stream indicating that feature extraction is starting, and noting how many files will need to be processed.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        total - The number of input files that will need to be processed.

      • printFeatureExtractionFileTestProgressMessage

        public static void printFeatureExtractionFileTestProgressMessage(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                                                 java.lang.String identifier,
                                                                 int current,
                                                                 int total)
        Print a formatted message to stream indicating that an input file is currently being pre-tested for validity.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        identifier - The identifier of the input file being processed.
        current - The count of this file amongst the total number of files being processed.
        total - The total number of input files that are being processed.

      • printFeatureExtractionProgressMessage

        public static void printFeatureExtractionProgressMessage(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                                         java.lang.String identifier,
                                                         int current,
                                                         int total)
        Print a formatted message to stream indicating that an input file is currently having features extracted from it.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        identifier - The identifier of the input file being processed.
        current - The count of this file amongst the total number of files being processed.
        total - The total number of input files that are being processed.

      • printFeatureExtractionDoneAFileProgressMessage

        public static void printFeatureExtractionDoneAFileProgressMessage(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                                                  java.lang.String identifier,
                                                                  int current,
                                                                  int total)
        Print a formatted message to stream indicating that an input file successfully had features extracted from it.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        identifier - The identifier of the input file being processed.
        current - The count of this file amongst the total number of files being processed.
        total - The total number of input files that are being processed.

      • printFeatureExtractionCompleteMessage

        public static void printFeatureExtractionCompleteMessage(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                                         java.lang.String saved_features_file_path,
                                                         int total_attempted_files)
        Print a Print a formatted message to stream indicating that feature extraction is complete. If saved_features_file_path is not null or empty, then also print how many files were successfully extracted out of the number attempted.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to write output to.
        saved_features_file_path - The path of the ACE XML Feature Values file holding the extracted features.
        total_attempted_files - The total number of files that were processed, successfully or not, during feature extraction.

                                                               java.lang.String save_path)
        Print a formatted message to stream indicating that an ACE XML feature definitions file is being saved.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        save_path - The path of the file being saved.

      • printErrorSummary

        public static void printErrorSummary(java.io.PrintStream stream,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> error_log,
                                     boolean header_only)
        Print a formatted message to stream providing a summary of all errors that occurred during processing. This includes both a summary header indicating the total number of messages and numbered error-by-error listing.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream to print the message to.
        error_log - The list of error messages to summarize.
        header_only - Only print the summary header if this is true. Also print each message individually if this is false.
